title: I think it's time to nerf Vayne W to what it was before.
body: From   4 / 6.5 / 9 / 11.5 / 14%      to 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% of true damage. Vayne is a freaking annoyance to deal with in general and the % max health true damage buff was unneccessary and sincerely stupid to start with. Vayne players already abuse of the dumb item called Guinsoo, making her 3 hit passive almost non existent late game, can we please at least tone down the damage to it's original value ? Honestly, I have enought to see Vayne everywhere just to shred you to piece with nothing I can do about it..

Lucian or whoever you pick ranged top , if you stomp them , they basically dont ever become a problem. Vayne does. Fiora share the % true damage but she have counterplay with it. What counterplay we have with Vayne? Dont get in her range? Cool I get zoned for free as her W is a toggle...the damage need to go down so she go back to the lane she belong, aka bot lane.

That's actually a decent idea and helps make {{item:3124}} feel better in her build by making the AP on it not entirely wasted.

You forgot that there used to be a flat damage component.

Also, I'd rather lose 14% of my health every third hit than 100% of my health instantly, which happens a little too often these days for my taste.
